list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of cloth or other material used to mend or strengthen a torn or weak point.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the jacket was of well-worn tweed with leather patches on the elbows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Áo khoác có mái tóc giả được mặc tốt với các mảng da trên khuỷu tay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part of something marked out from the rest by a particular characteristic.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his hair was combed forward to hide a growing bald patch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tóc anh ta được chải về phía trước để che giấu một bản vá hói đang phát triển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small piece of ground, especially one used for gardening.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they spent Sundays digging their vegetable patch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đã dành chủ nhật đào vá rau của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a temporary electrical or telephone connection.
a small piece of code inserted into a program to improve its functioning or to correct an error.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a program patch that fixes a bug
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một bản vá chương trình sửa lỗi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: mend or strengthen (fabric or an item of clothing) by putting a piece of material over a hole or weak point in it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quần jean của cô được vá gọn gàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: treat someone's injuries or repair the damage to something, especially hastily.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they did their best to patch up the gaping wounds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đã làm hết sức mình để vá những vết thương gaping

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: connect by a temporary electrical, radio, or telephonic connection.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Ralph had patched her through to the meeting by walkie-talkie
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ralph đã vá cô ấy đến cuộc họp của Walkie-Talkie

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: correct, enhance, or modify (a routine or program) by inserting a patch.
